attributes.action: Only carry out a hard brexit and cut all ties with the EU and Brussels
attributes.background: The majority voted for brexit so provide us with a hard brexit. Don't keep sending money to Brussels for luxury food and hotels, save the NHS, police force, fire service and our economy instead. Listen to what the people want not what remoaners, MPs or EU leaders want.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
